 2012-07072012-05-31,  ,  ,  ,  CIC
ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
PrecisReappointment, effective August 5, 2012, of RONALD KENJI YAMAUCHI of Vancouver, British Columbia, as a full-time member of the Immigration and Refugee Board (Vancouver Regional Office), to hold office during good behaviour until March 31, 2013 or unitl the day prior to the coming into force of the Balanced Refugee Reform Act, whichever is earlier.
